import "./testimonials.scss" export default function Testimonials() { const data = [ { id: 1, name: "orang pertama", title: "alkvmiena", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/1680172/pexels-photo-1680172.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/twitter.png", desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Placeat magnam dolorem.", }, { id: 2, name: "orang kedua", title: "adkfkal sesef", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/428321/pexels-photo-428321.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/youtube.png", desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Placeat magnam dolorem recusandae perspiciatis ducimus vel hic temporibus. ", featured: true, }, { id: 3, name: "orang ketiga", title: "adskfjkds", img: "https://images.pexels.com/photos/3863793/pexels-photo-3863793.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&w=500", icon: "assets/linkedin.png", desc: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Placeat magnam dolorem", }, ]; return (

Testimonials

{data.map ((a) =>(
{a.desc}

{a.name}

{a.title}

))}
) }
